maxlength.value: 支付宝小程序无默认值，其余平台默认为-1

prefixIcon.description: Pre-icon, the name of the icon class in the icon component
prefixIcon.description_zh: 前置图标，icon组件中的图标类名

suffixIcon.description: Rear icon, the name of the icon class in the icon component
suffixIcon.description_zh: 后置图标，icon组件中的图标类名

showWordLimit.description: To display the word limit, maxlength needs to be set at the same time
showWordLimit.description_zh: 显示字数限制，需要同时设置 maxlength

confirm-type.description: Set the text of the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard to take effect only when type='text'
confirm-type.description_zh: 设置键盘右下角按钮的文字，仅在type='text'时生效

confirm-hold.description: Whether to keep the keyboard unfolded when you click the button in the lower right corner of the keyboard
confirm-hold.description_zh: 点击键盘右下角按钮时是否保持键盘不收起

always-embed.description: The native attribute of WeChat Mini Program forces input to be in the same layer state, and the input will switch to the non-same layer state when the default focus is (only effective under iOS)
always-embed.description_zh: 微信小程序原生属性，强制 input 处于同层状态，默认 focus 时 input 会切到非同层状态 (仅在 iOS 下生效)

placeholderStyle.description: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式，目前仅支持color,font-size和font-weight
placeholderStyle.description_zh: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式，目前仅支持color,font-size和font-weight

placeholderClass.description: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式类
placeholderClass.description_zh: 原生属性，指定 placeholder 的样式类

cursorSpacing.description: Native property, which specifies the distance between the cursor and the keyboard. Take the minimum value of the distance between input and the distance specified by cursor-spacing as the distance between the cursor and the keyboard
cursorSpacing.description_zh: 原生属性，指定光标与键盘的距离。取 input 距离底部的距离和cursor-spacing指定的距离的最小值作为光标与键盘的距离

cursor.description: Native property, which specifies the cursor position when focusing
cursor.description_zh: 原生属性，指定focus时的光标位置

selectionStart.description: Native attributes, cursor start position, are valid when auto-gathering, and need to be used in conjunction with selection-end
selectionStart.description_zh: 原生属性，光标起始位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-end搭配使用

selectionEnd.description: Native attributes, cursor end position, valid when auto-gathering, need to be used with selection-start
selectionEnd.description_zh: 原生属性，光标结束位置，自动聚集时有效，需与selection-start搭配使用

adjustPosition.description: Native attributes, whether the page is automatically pushed up when the keyboard pops up
adjustPosition.description_zh: 原生属性，键盘弹起时，是否自动上推页面

label.description: Set the title on the left

size.description: Set the size of the input box

error.description: Set the error status of the input box, which is red when the error status is in
error.description_zh: 设置输入框错误状态，错误状态时为红色

center.description: When there is a label attribute, set the title and input box to be vertically centered, and the top is centered by default
center.description_zh: 当有label属性时，设置标题和输入框垂直居中，默认为顶部居中

label-width.description: Set the width of the header on the left

use-suffix-slot.description_zh: 使用 后置图标 插槽

use-prefix-slot.description_zh: 使用 前置图标 插槽

no-border.description: 非 cell 类型下是否隐藏下划线
no-border.description_zh: 非 cell 类型下是否隐藏下划线

prop.description: The form field model field name, which is required if the form validation function is used
prop.description_zh: 表单域 model 字段名，在使用表单校验功能的情况下，该属性是必填的

rules.description: Form validation rules, which can be used in conjunction with the wd-form component
rules.description_zh: 表单验证规则，结合wd-form组件使用

clearTrigger.description: When the clear icon is displayed, always indicates that the input box is not displayed when it is empty, and focus indicates that the input box is focused and not displayed when it is empty
clearTrigger.description_zh: 显示清除图标的时机，always 表示输入框不为空时展示，focus 表示输入框聚焦且不为空时展示

focusWhenClear.description: Whether or not to focus the input box when the Clear button is clicked
focusWhenClear.description_zh: 是否在点击清除按钮时聚焦输入框

ignoreCompositionEvent.description: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。 为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件,且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件。
ignoreCompositionEvent.description_zh: 是否忽略组件内对文本合成系统事件的处理。为 false 时将触发 compositionstart、compositionend、compositionupdate 事件，且在文本合成期间会触发 input 事件。

events.name: focus
events.description: Listen for the focus event in the input field
events.params: { value, height }, height 为键盘高度

events.name: blur
events.description: Listen for the input box blur event

events.name: change
events.description: Listen for input field modification events

events.name: clear
events.description: Listen for the input box to clear button event
events.description_zh: 监听输入框清空按钮事件

events.name: confirm
events.description: When you click Complete, the confirm event is triggered
events.description_zh: 点击完成时， 触发 confirm 事件

events.name: keyboardheightchange
events.description: This event is triggered when the keyboard height changes
events.description_zh: 键盘高度发生变化的时候触发此事件

events.name: clickprefixicon
events.description: Triggered when the front icon is clicked

events.name: clicksuffixicon
events.description: Triggered when the rear icon is clicked
